Job Summary

We are excited to invite a dedicated and motivated Assistant Accountant to join our dynamic team. This role is crucial in documenting our company’s financial transactions, preparing comprehensive financial statements, and handling general accounting duties. We are looking for a detail-oriented, highly organized individual with a strong understanding of accounting best practices.

Responsibilities

  • Financial Data Entry: Accurately enter financial data and transactions.
  • Budget Analysis: Analyze budgets and other financial information to provide insights.
  • Bank Reconciliation: Reconcile bank statements to ensure accuracy.
  • Financial Reporting: Prepare detailed financial reports and statements.
  • Transaction Verification: Verify the accuracy of all entered transactions.
  • Accounts Management: Process accounts payable and accounts receivable efficiently.
  • Policy Creation: Develop and implement accounting policies to comply with all relevant regulations.


Qualifications

  • Language Skills: Ability to speak Chinese is a plus.
  • Education: Bachelor’s degree in accounting or a related field is preferred.
  • Experience: Previous experience as an accountant, bookkeeper, or in a similar role is advantageous.
  • Accounting Knowledge: Strong knowledge of generally accepted accounting principles (GAAP).
  • Technical Skills: Proficient in Microsoft Excel, QuickBooks, and basic accounting systems.
  • Analytical Skills: Strong mathematical and analytical abilities.
  • Attention to Detail: Exceptional attention to detail and organizational skills.
  • Communication: Excellent time management and communication skills.
  • Fresh Graduates: New college graduates are welcome to apply!


Job Details

  • Job Type: Full-time
  • Pay: $19.00 - $23.00 per hour
  • Expected Hours: 40 per week
  • Experience Level: Minimum 1 year preferred
  • Work Environment: Office
  • Work Days: Monday to Friday


Location

  • Commute: Must be able to commute to City of Industry, CA 91789 (Required).
  • Relocation: Must be willing to relocate to City of Industry, CA 91789 before starting work (Required).


Work Location

  • In Person


If you are looking for a rewarding opportunity to grow your accounting career in a supportive and dynamic environment, we encourage you to apply. Join us and contribute to our financial success!
